snippet: The planned joining of BAE Systems and EADS, which would have expressly limited the states’ power to a veto of hostile takeovers, was brought low by political interference.
abstract: News analysis; aerospace mega-merger between BAE Systems and European Aeronautic Defense & Space, which would have sharply limited the influence of several national stakeholders, collapsed due to political interference; two firms must now try to win over skeptical investors.
lead_paragraph: The planned joining of BAE Systems and EADS, which would have expressly limited the states’ power to a veto of hostile takeovers, was brought low by political interference.

headline.seo: Missteps Doomed Merger of EADS and BAE — News Analysis
headline.print_headline: An Aerospace Merger Undone by Politics, Not Economics

keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
keywords.name: organizations
